law.catch_line: On or before December 31 of each year, the Department of Agriculture shall report to the Governor, a...
law.text: On or before December 31 of each year, the Department of Agriculture shall report to the Governor, and, in accordance with § 2-1246 of the State Government Article, the General Assembly, on the farm acreage covered by nutrient management plans and the implementation and evaluation of those plans.
